name: SAS WEB ads-banner-video Plugin
author: Suresh Kumar Mukhiya

sections.description: SAS WEB ads-banner-video Plugin is a simple plugin that can be used to place sidebar banner with description, full width video with description or half width banner with description. This can be done without any coding knowledge.
sections.installation:
Installation from zip:

1. From wp-admin interface, select Plugins -> Add New
2. Click Upload
3.  Click \"Choose File\" and select zip
4. Click \"Install Now\"
5. Activate the plugin through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress

Installation from WordPress Plugin Directory

1. From wp-admin interface, go to Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for \"SAS WEB ads-banner-video Plugin\"
3. Click Install Now under the plugin name
4. Click Ok to install the plugin
5. Click Activate Plugin once installed
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation from zip:

1. From wp-admin interface, select Plugins -> Add New
2. Click Upload
3.  Click \"Choose File\" and select zip
4. Click \"Install Now\"
5. Activate the plugin through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress

Installation from WordPress Plugin Directory

1. From wp-admin interface, go to Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for \"SAS WEB ads-banner-video Plugin\"
3. Click Install Now under the plugin name
4. Click Ok to install the plugin
5. Click Activate Plugin once installed

How to install the plugin?

Simply, upload to the plugin folder and click on activate link. Once done you can put the widget anywhere in the widget area.

Can I edit the codes?

This is a simple plugin with only few page codes. You can easily edit the codes according to your requirement. You can modify the codes as per your need according to license.

Where can I contact in case of problem?

You can email me at @itsmeskm99@gmail.com

Can you set up this plugin in my website?

Yes, You can email me at itsmeskm99@gmail.com

short_description: Sidebar ads, banner video plugin allows you to add images, video to your sidebar without coding.
description: SAS WEB ads-banner-video Plugin is a simple plugin that can be used to place sidebar banner with description, full width video with description or half width banner with description. This can be done without any coding knowledge.
